Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.perscholas.whatgoeswhere.controllers.HomeController

public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Spring MVC Controller class Connects the JSP and model

      • HomeController

        @Autowired
public HomeController​(ItemService itemService,
                      UserService userService,
                      CredentialService credentialService)
        Class constructor binding various service classes
        Parameters:
        itemService - a service object for Item model
        userService - a service object for User model
        credentialService - a service object for Credential model
        See Also:
        ItemService, UserService, CredentialService

    • Method Detail

      • showIndexPage

        @GetMapping("/")
public java.lang.String showIndexPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps get method for the index page The root location(/) is mapped to the index page. The returned string is passed to WebAppConfig to add prefix and suffix.
        Parameters:
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the index page

      • searchItemName

        @PostMapping("/find")
public java.lang.String searchItemName​(@RequestParam("itemName")
                                       java.lang.String itemName,
                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps post method for the find request from the index page It adds the items to the model attribute to display the search result in the index page.
        Parameters:
        itemName - the item's name submitted from the client
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the index page

      • showListPage

        @GetMapping("/list")
public java.lang.String showListPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps get method for the list page It grabs all items from the database and adds to the model attribute to display in the list page.
        Parameters:
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the list page

      • showAddItemPage

        @GetMapping("/addItem")
public java.lang.String showAddItemPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps get method for the Add Item page It passes 3 model attributes: - message: for displaying any error message - item: to populate user input when redirected - BestOption: for bestOption select field) attributes to the JSP page.
        Parameters:
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the Add Item page
        See Also:
        BestOption

      • addItem

        @PostMapping("/addItem")
public java.lang.String addItem​(@ModelAttribute("item")
                                Item item,
                                org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                org.springframework.validation.BindingResult errors)
        Maps post method for the addItem request
        Parameters:
        item - an Item object passed from the add_item JSP containing user input
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        errors - result holder for DataBinder, capable of error registration
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the list page if no exception is caught, the Add Item page otherwise
        See Also:
        Item, DataBinder

      • showLogInPage

public java.lang.String showLogInPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps get method for login page It passes a message attribute for an error, if any.
        Parameters:
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the login page

public java.lang.String showRegisterPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps get method for register page It passes 2 model attributes: - message: for displaying any error message - user: to populate user input when redirected
        Parameters:
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the register page

      • addUser

        @PostMapping("/registerNewUser")
public java.lang.String addUser​(@RequestParam("userName")
                                java.lang.String username,
                                @RequestParam("password")
                                java.lang.String password,
                                @RequestParam("eMail")
                                java.lang.String email,
                                @RequestParam("firstName")
                                java.lang.String firstName,
                                @RequestParam("lastName")
                                java.lang.String lastName,
                                org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Maps post method for registerNewUser request
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the new credential
        password - the password of the new credential
        email - the email of the new user
        firstName - the first name of the new user
        lastName - the last name of the new user
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        request - a HttpServletRequest object to automatically log the user in after registration
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the profile page if no exception is caught, the register page otherwise

      • showProfilePage

        @GetMapping("/profile")
public java.lang.String showProfilePage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps get method for profile page This page is not accessible without a valid credential so the exception is not expected to be thrown.
        Parameters:
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the profile page if no exception is caught, the login page otherwise

      • showEditItemPage

        @GetMapping("/editItem")
public java.lang.String showEditItemPage​(@RequestParam("itemId")
                                         int itemId,
                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps get method for the editItem page Passes two model attributes - item: an Item object to edit - bestOptions: a collection of BestOption enum values for select input
        Parameters:
        itemId - the id number of the item to be edited
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the editItem page
        See Also:
        Item, BestOption

      • editItem

        @PostMapping("/editItem")
public java.lang.String editItem​(@ModelAttribute("item")
                                 Item uitem,
                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                 org.springframework.validation.BindingResult errors)
        Maps post method for the editItem request
        Parameters:
        uitem - an item with updated data from user input
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        errors - result holder for DataBinder, capable of error registration
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the profile page if no exception is caught, the editItem page otherwise
        See Also:
        Item, DataBinder

                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps post method for the deleteItem request
        Parameters:
        id - the id number of the item to be deleted
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the profile page

      • showDeleteUserPage

        @GetMapping("/deleteUser")
public java.lang.String showDeleteUserPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps get method for the deleteUser page Sends a model attribute email of the current user. This page is not accessible without a valid credential so the exception is not expected to be thrown.
        Parameters:
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the deleteUser page if no exception is caught, the login page otherwise

      • deleteUser

        @PostMapping("/deleteUser")
public java.lang.String deleteUser​(@RequestParam("message")
                                   java.lang.String message,
                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Maps post method for the deleteUser request This page is not accessible without a valid credential so the exception is not expected to be thrown.
        Parameters:
        message - a string of message from the user input
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        request - a HttpServletRequest object to automatically log the user out after deleting its account
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the main page if no exception is caught, the login page otherwise

public java.lang.String contact​(@RequestParam("message")

                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Maps post method for the contact request *
        Parameters:

        email - an email address from the user input
        model - a Model object holding model attributes
        Returns:
        the JSP name for the main page
